app_descript:
App Name: Epic!

App Package Name: com.getepic.Epic

Brief:

Epic! is an immersive digital library app designed to foster a love for reading among children. With a vast selection of over 35,000 children's books and learning videos, Epic! serves as a valuable resource for both home and educational use. This versatile app provides access to an extensive range of materials, including bilingual books and audiobooks, tailored to cater to individual reading preferences and levels.

  • üìà Reading Progress Tracking: Monitor reading achievements with an in-app log and weekly updates for parents. üìä

Community:
